data.name: The Eternal Cylinder
data.detailed_description:
In The Eternal Cylinder, players control a herd of adorable creatures called Trebhum and must explore a strange alien world filled with exotic lifeforms and surreal environments. All whilst the constant threat of the Cylinder, a gargantuan rolling structure of ancient origin which crushes everything in its path, looms.

In this unique alien ecosystem, real-time world destruction, animal AI, exploration, and puzzle design all combine to deliver an unforgettable adventure. Your Trebhum begin at the bottom of the food chain, but can mutate and evolve new physical attributes and abilities

Unforgettable Alien World

Players must explore a bizarre gorgeous world populated with unforgettable vistas and unique landscapes which have something new to discover around every corner.

4 Unique Biomes to Discover and Explore
Players can explore 4 unique biomes including alien savannas and infected habitats, each with their own dedicated ecosystems and unique creatures to discover.

Build Your Own Alien Family

Develop a nomadic herd of unique alien creatures called Trebhum. Players control one Trebhum from the herd at a time and the rest follow, but you can switch to any individual member of their herd at will. Explore the world to rescue more of your brethren and continuously expand your family.

Unique Mutation System

Although Trebhum are generally frail, they have the unique ability to mutate and unlock new skills by consuming natural edibles which populate the world. Players must explore and experiment with a vast array of fruits, flora and alien creatures to unlock new powers and gameplay options.

50+ Mutations to Discover
Players can unlock more than 50+ unique mutations as they explore the world, each enabling new gameplay options. These include new traversal options such as the ability to fly and swim, but also new offensive moves. Most mutations stack thus creating a truly expansive skill set which is constantly evolving.

A Trebhum for Everyone
Enjoy a rich variety of Trebhum designs, as each mutation combine with one another to create surprising new creatures. This allows your herd to continue to evolve as you explore new areas.

Solve Ancient Mysteries

Explore the world to discover a vast array of challenging puzzles to solve and overcome.

Real-Time World Destruction

Everything in the world can be destroyed in real-time by The Eternal Cylinder, so players must continuously evade its destructive path in order to survive whilst marveling at the visual splendor of its godlike power.

data.short_description: Control a herd of charming creatures called Trebhum and explore an unforgettable alien world filled with exotic lifeforms and surreal environments. Discover dozens of mutations to overcome puzzles, explore new biomes, and survive on a dangerous planet.
data.reviews:
“The Eternal Cylinder is one of the most meaningful and profound experiences I’ve had in the past couple of years. An unforgettable experience.”
95/100 – Gamecritics

“The Eternal Cylinder is a gorgeous adventure game that features one of the most compelling stories I've seen in years.”
9.5/10 – PCInvasion

“ACE Team knows how to put together game universes that are intriguing, vaguely disturbing, and always engaging.”
9/10 – Softpedia News

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Fantasy Violence, Mild Blood, 
Partial Nudity
